entry.value: SELECT * FROM MASTER.T_VIOL_TX_EXCLUSION WHERE :TRX_DATE_TIME BETWEEN START_DATE_TIME AND END_DATE_TIME AND NVL(EXCLUSION_STAGE,0)=NVL (:EXCLUSION_STAGE) AND NVL(AGENCY_ID,0)=NVL(:AGENCY_ID)AND NVL(PLAZA_ID,0)=NVL(:PLAZA_ID)AND NVL(LANE_ID,0)=NVL(:LANE_ID)AND NVL(LANE_MODE,0)=NVL(:LANE_MODE)AND NVL(VIOL_TYPE,0)=NVL(:VIOL_TYPE)AND NVL(TOLL_REVENUE_TYPE,0)=NVL(:TOLL_REVENUE_TYPE) AND PLATE_STATE is null OR PLATE_STATE=:PLATE_STATE AND PLATE_NUMBER is null OR PLATE_NUMBER=:PLATE_NUMBER AND NVL(VEHICLE_SPEED,0)=NVL(:VEHICLE_SPEED) AND NVL(ETC_ACCOUNT_ID,0)=NVL(:ETC_ACCOUNT_ID) AND TX_TYPE_IND is null OR TX_TYPE_IND=:TX_TYPE_IND AND TX_SUBTYPE_IND is null OR TX_SUBTYPE_IND=:TX_SUBTYPE_IND
